ing: coarsely ground black pepper to taste
des: "Easy slow cooker potato soup with ham. Perfect for a wintry day and makes the house smell delicious. Serve with buttered toast and follow with warm apple pie."
ins:
Combine potatoes, ham, leek, celery, carrots, butter, garlic powder, dill, and bay leaf in a slow cooker; season with salt and pepper. Pour chicken broth over the mixture.
Cook on Low for 8 hours.
